description:
Take on the wildest routes in versatile trail runners. The twelfth edition of the Peregrine features a new upper design that seamlessly hugs your foot, with an internal heel counter for extra support on the trail. The rock plate has been modified for extra flexibility, without sacrificing underfoot protection. With it's sticky rubber and large lugs, these cushioned trail running shoes provide sure footing in rough off-road conditions.

  • Lightweight engineered mesh upper and TPU overlays
  • Full-length PWRRUN midsole for a plush run with high energy return
  • Protective rockplate protects against trail bumps
  • Sticky PWRTRAC rubber outsole with aggressive 5mm lugs
name: Saucony Peregrine 12 Trail Running Shoes - Women's
